backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing features, associated files, components, and test IDs for deployment verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping frontend file paths to their descriptions.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining steps to verify Version 6 is correctly live with proper UI and metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining the Valentine-themed color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template with cache-busting headers and correct canonical and social metadata for the Sunidhi version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that redirects incorrect URLs, syncs metadata, logs production checks, and renders the Valentine prompt.
Interactive proposal component with evasive 'No' button logic and a success state showing a celebratory meme.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized configuration defining all Valentine-specific text such as title, description, and success message.
frontend/src/config/publicSiteUrl.ts: Utilities for canonical URL handling and redirecting any URL containing 'mahek' to the correct public site URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, refetching on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider implementing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark romantic theme plus custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, applying global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/appMetadata.ts: Provides functions to update meta and link tags and synchronize page metadata with branding settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and features, noting a live-site publishing problem and required fixes.
